Class DevCardPurchaseScene

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.TextScene
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.scenes.DevCardPurchaseScene
public class DevCardPurchaseScene
extends TextScene
CLI scene used to let the user do a devCard purchase

      private java.lang.String[] devCardRequRew​(java.util.List<ResourceStack> list, java.lang.String[] arrayToPrint, int deckCount, boolean isInput, int rowInput, int rowOutput, int[] col)
      Prints the devCardRequirements on the arrayToPrint
      Parameters:
      list - the list of resourceStack
      arrayToPrint - the arrayToPrint
      deckCount - the number of decks
      isInput - Are those input or output resources?
      rowInput - the input row
      rowOutput - the output row
      col - the column
      Returns:
      the modified arrayToPrint
